367 
WGUS66 KEKA 092325
FFAEKA
URGENT - IMMEDIATE BROADCAST REQUESTED
FLOOD WATCH
NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE EUREKA, CA
325 PM PST TUE DEC 9 2014

...THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN EUREKA HAS ISSUED A FLOOD WATCH 
FOR THE FOLLOWING RIVERS IN CALIFORNIA...

  RUSSIAN RIVER NEAR HOPLAND AFFECTING MENDOCINO COUNTY 
  NAVARRO RIVER AT NAVARRO AFFECTING MENDOCINO COUNTY 
  EEL RIVER AT FERNBRIDGE AFFECTING HUMBOLDT COUNTY 
  EEL RIVER NEAR SCOTIA AFFECTING HUMBOLDT COUNTY 
  VAN DUZEN RIVER NEAR BRIDGEVILLE AFFECTING HUMBOLDT COUNTY 

A STRONG AND MOIST WEATHER SYSTEM WILL BRING WIDESPREAD HEAVY RAINFALL
TO THE AREA WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING. RAIN AMOUNTS WILL
RANGE FROM 5 TO 8 INCHES ACROSS THE RIVER BASINS.


PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...

STAY TUNED TO DEVELOPMENTS BY LISTENING TO NOAA WEATHER RADIO OR YOUR
LOCAL TV OR RADIO STATIONS.

RESIDENTS AND THOSE WITH INTERESTS NEAR THE RIVER SHOULD MONITOR 
RISING WATER LEVELS AND BE PREPARED FOR POSSIBLE FLOOD WARNINGS.

&&

CAC045-101125-
/O.NEW.KEKA.FL.A.0001.141211T1200Z-000000T0000Z/
/HOPC1.0.ER.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.OO/
325 PM PST TUE DEC 9 2014

 THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN EUREKA HAS ISSUED A 

* FLOOD WATCH FOR 
  THE RUSSIAN RIVER NEAR HOPLAND.
* FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE...OR UNTIL THE WATCH
  IS CANCELLED.
* AT  2:00 PM TUESDAY THE STAGE WAS 1.7 FEET.
* MAJOR FLOODING IS POSSIBLE. 
* FLOOD STAGE IS 21.0 FEET.
* FORECAST...FLOOD STAGE MAY BE REACHED BY THURSDAY MORNING.
* THIS RIVER IS FORECAST TO RISE ABOVE MONITOR STAGE OF 18.0 FT 
  EARLY THURSDAY MORNING. THEN IS EXPECTED TO RISE ABOVE FLOOD STAGE OF  
  21.0 FT LATE THURSDAY MORNING. THEN FORECAST TO CREST NEAR 26.5 FT 
  AROUND THURSDAY NOON. THEN FORECAST TO FALL BELOW FLOOD STAGE 
  LATE THURSDAY EVENING. THEN FORECAST TO FALL BELOW MONITOR STAGE 
  LATE THURSDAY EVENING. 

$$

CAC045-101125-
/O.NEW.KEKA.FL.A.0002.141211T1330Z-000000T0000Z/
/NVRC1.0.ER.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.OO/
325 PM PST TUE DEC 9 2014

 THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN EUREKA HAS ISSUED A 

* FLOOD WATCH FOR 
  THE NAVARRO RIVER AT NAVARRO.
* FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE...OR UNTIL THE WATCH
  IS CANCELLED.
* AT  2:15 PM TUESDAY THE STAGE WAS 5.8 FEET.
* MAJOR FLOODING IS POSSIBLE. 
* FLOOD STAGE IS 23.0 FEET.
* FORECAST...FLOOD STAGE MAY BE REACHED BY THURSDAY MORNING.
* THIS RIVER IS FORECAST TO RECEDE TO NEAR 4.5 FT LATE WEDNESDAY 
  EVENING. THEN EXPECTED TO RISE ABOVE FLOOD STAGE OF 23.0 FT 
  THURSDAY MORNING. THEN FORECAST TO CREST NEAR 35.0 FT THURSDAY 
  EVENING. THEN FORECAST TO FALL BELOW FLOOD STAGE LATE FRIDAY 
  MORNING. THEN FORECAST TO RECEDE TO NEAR 18.0 FT FRIDAY 
  AFTERNOON.

$$

CAC023-101125-
/O.NEW.KEKA.FL.A.0003.141211T1830Z-000000T0000Z/
/FRNC1.0.ER.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.OO/
325 PM PST TUE DEC 9 2014

 THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN EUREKA HAS ISSUED A 

* FLOOD WATCH FOR 
  THE EEL RIVER AT FERNBRIDGE.
* FROM THURSDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE...OR UNTIL THE WATCH IS 
  CANCELLED.
* AT  2:15 PM TUESDAY THE STAGE WAS 5.8 FEET.
* MAJOR FLOODING IS POSSIBLE. 
* FLOOD STAGE IS 20.0 FEET.
* FORECAST...FLOOD STAGE MAY BE REACHED BY NOON THURSDAY.
* THIS RIVER IS FORECAST TO RECEDE TO NEAR 4.0 FT WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON.
  THEN FORECAST TO RISE ABOVE MONITOR STAGE OF 14.0 FT THURSDAY 
  MORNING. THEN EXPECTED TO RISE ABOVE FLOOD STAGE OF 20.0 FT AROUND 
  NOON THURSDAY. THEN FORECAST TO CREST NEAR 26.0 FT EARLY FRIDAY 
  MORNING. THEN FORECAST TO RECEDE TO NEAR 20.0 FT FRIDAY AFTERNOON.

$$

CAC023-101125-
/O.NEW.KEKA.FL.A.0004.141212T0200Z-000000T0000Z/
/SCOC1.0.ER.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.OO/
325 PM PST TUE DEC 9 2014

 THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN EUREKA HAS ISSUED A 

* FLOOD WATCH FOR 
  THE EEL RIVER NEAR SCOTIA.
* FROM THURSDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE...OR UNTIL THE WATCH IS 
  CANCELLED.
* AT  2:15 PM TUESDAY THE STAGE WAS 17.9 FEET.
* MINOR FLOODING IS POSSIBLE. 
* FLOOD STAGE IS 51.0 FEET.
* FORECAST...FLOOD STAGE MAY BE REACHED BY THURSDAY EVENING.
* THIS RIVER IS FORECAST TO RECEDE TO NEAR 16.0 FT WEDNESDAY 
  AFTERNOON. THEN FORECAST TO RISE ABOVE MONITOR STAGE OF 45.0 FT 
  THURSDAY AFTERNOON. THEN EXPECTED TO RISE ABOVE FLOOD STAGE OF 51.0
  FT THURSDAY EVENING. THEN FORECAST TO CREST NEAR 55.0 FT THURSDAY
  NIGHT. THEN FORECAST TO FALL BELOW FLOOD STAGE FRIDAY MORNING. THEN
  FORECAST TO FALL BELOW MONITOR STAGE LATE FRIDAY MORNING. THEN 
  FORECAST TO RECEDE TO NEAR 40.0 FT FRIDAY AFTERNOON.

$$

CAC023-101125-
/O.NEW.KEKA.FL.A.0005.141211T0830Z-000000T0000Z/
/BRGC1.0.ER.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.OO/
325 PM PST TUE DEC 9 2014

 THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN EUREKA HAS ISSUED A 

* FLOOD WATCH FOR 
  THE VAN DUZEN RIVER NEAR BRIDGEVILLE.
* FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE...OR UNTIL THE WATCH
  IS CANCELLED.
* AT 2:15 PM TUESDAY THE STAGE WAS 3.1 FEET.
* MODERATE FLOODING IS POSSIBLE. 
* FLOOD STAGE IS 17.0 FEET.
* FORECAST...FLOOD STAGE MAY BE REACHED BY EARLY THURSDAY MORNING.
* THIS RIVER IS FORECAST TO RECEDE TO NEAR 2.5 FT WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON.
  THEN FORECAST TO RISE ABOVE MONITOR STAGE OF 13.0 FT LATE WEDNESDAY
  NIGHT. THEN EXPECTED TO RISE ABOVE FLOOD STAGE OF 17.0 FT EARLY 
  THURSDAY MORNING. THEN FORECAST TO CREST NEAR 20.0 FT THURSDAY 
  MORNING. THEN FORECAST TO FALL BELOW FLOOD STAGE AROUND NOON
  THURSDAY. THEN FORECAST TO FALL BELOW MONITOR STAGE THURSDAY 
  EVENING.

$$
